caption.p:
Percentages of Th subsets by flow cytometry analysis in cultured splenic CD4 + T cells on d 5
in vitro ( n = 6 in each group). (a), Isotype controls for Th1, Th2, Th17, and Treg cells. (b) through (e), The representative results for each group. (f) through (i), The percentage of double-positive cells. Data are expressed as means ± SD. * p< 0.05 vs. PBS group. # p< 0.05 vs. Pnu group. + p< 0.05 vs. MLA group
